constituent: africa, pinnacle, parthenon, acropolis, can, mouth, street, nail, spike
heisigStory: This kanji, an abbreviation for Africa, is now used chiefly for its sound, "a," not unlike the kanji for Italy and the sound "i" that we met earlier (Frame 1245). Its composite elements are: pinnacles . . . can.
koohiiStory1: Can you see Africa from The Pinnacle? I can! I can!
koohiiStory2: A kinda pictogram: ´BoT´, the first 3 letters in ´Botswana´ an African country.
